content.raw: Based on the limited testing that I have done I believe that the call to `imu.Orientation()` returns a quaternion that rotates 3d vectors from world frame to sensor frame. I think it would be helpful to put it in the documentation with wording similar to how it affects 3d vectors to be more similar to  what is experienced with documentation of hardware IMU's.
content.html: Based on the limited testing that I have done I believe that the call to imu.Orientation() returns a quaternion that rotates 3d vectors from world frame to sensor frame. I think it would be helpful to put it in the documentation with wording similar to how it affects 3d vectors to be more similar to what is experienced with documentation of hardware IMU's.
